Breakfast.title: Milk Tea
Breakfast.shortDescription: Rich black tea simmered with milk and sugar.
Breakfast.fullDescription: A comforting blend of robust black tea, steamed milk, and sugar, offering a classic creamy and sweet beverage.

Breakfast.title: Black Tea
Breakfast.shortDescription: Enhanced set with additional meat options.
Breakfast.fullDescription: Our premium Thakali experience includes all components of the Classic Set plus your choice of chicken, mutton, or fish curry. Served with special mountain herbs tea.

Breakfast.title: Phapar ko Roti + Aalu Dam
Breakfast.shortDescription: Enhanced set with additional meat options.
Breakfast.fullDescription: Our premium Thakali experience includes all components of the Classic Set plus your choice of chicken, mutton, or fish curry. Served with special mountain herbs tea.

Breakfast.title: Sel Roti + Aalu Dam
Breakfast.shortDescription: Enhanced set with additional meat options.
Breakfast.fullDescription: Our premium Thakali experience includes all components of the Classic Set plus your choice of chicken, mutton, or fish curry. Served with special mountain herbs tea.

Breakfast.title: Kanchenbo (Buck Wheat Fry)
Breakfast.fullDescription: A traditional Nepali Thakali meal with steamed rice, lentil soup, seasonal vegetables, spicy pickle, and fermented leafy greens. Served with complementary curd and papad.

Thakali_Khana_set.title: Veg Khana (set)
Thakali_Khana_set.fullDescription: A traditional Nepali Thakali meal with steamed rice, lentil soup, seasonal vegetables, spicy pickle, and fermented leafy greens. Served with complementary curd and papad.

Thakali_Khana_set.title: Chicken Khana (set)
Thakali_Khana_set.fullDescription: A traditional Nepali Thakali meal with steamed rice, lentil soup, seasonal vegetables, spicy pickle, and fermented leafy greens. Served with complementary curd and papad.

Thakali_Khana_set.title: Mutton Khana (set)
Thakali_Khana_set.fullDescription: A traditional Nepali Thakali meal with steamed rice, lentil soup, seasonal vegetables, spicy pickle, and fermented leafy greens. Served with complementary curd and papad.

Thakali_Khana_set.title: Fish Khana (set)
Thakali_Khana_set.shortDescription: Enhanced set with additional meat options.
Thakali_Khana_set.fullDescription: Our premium Thakali experience includes all components of the Classic Set plus your choice of chicken, mutton, or fish curry. Served with special mountain herbs tea.

Dhido Set.title: Chicken Dhido (set)
Dhido Set.shortDescription: Lentil soup with rice and vegetable curry.
Dhido Set.fullDescription: A wholesome vegetarian meal featuring perfectly cooked lentils, steamed rice, and a selection of seasonal vegetable curries. Served with tangy pickles and crispy papad.

Dhido Set.title: Mutton Dhido (set)
Dhido Set.shortDescription: Lentil soup with rice and vegetable curry.
Dhido Set.fullDescription: A wholesome vegetarian meal featuring perfectly cooked lentils, steamed rice, and a selection of seasonal vegetable curries. Served with tangy pickles and crispy papad.

Dhido Set.title: Fish Dhido (set)
Dhido Set.shortDescription: Lentil soup with rice and vegetable curry.
Dhido Set.fullDescription: A wholesome vegetarian meal featuring perfectly cooked lentils, steamed rice, and a selection of seasonal vegetable curries. Served with tangy pickles and crispy papad.

Dhido Set.title: Fish Dhido (set)
Dhido Set.shortDescription: Assortment of vegetable dishes with rice.
Dhido Set.fullDescription: A balanced platter featuring five different vegetable preparations, dal, rice, roti, raita, and dessert. Perfect for experiencing the diversity of Nepali vegetarian cuisine.

Chop Suey (Non Veg).title: Chicken Curry
Chop Suey (Non Veg).shortDescription: Spicy chicken curry with traditional spices.
Chop Suey (Non Veg).fullDescription: Tender chicken pieces slow-cooked in a rich blend of traditional Nepali spices and herbs. Served with steamed rice and achar. A flavorful journey to the Himalayas.

Chop Suey (Non Veg).title: Buff Momo
Chop Suey (Non Veg).shortDescription: Steamed buffalo dumplings with dipping sauce.
Chop Suey (Non Veg).fullDescription: Delicate dumplings filled with seasoned buffalo meat, steamed to perfection. Served with our signature tomato achar and sesame chutney. A Nepali street food classic.

Appetizers (Non Veg).title: Sel Roti
Appetizers (Non Veg).fullDescription: A festive sweet bread made from rice flour, deep-fried to a perfect golden brown. Crispy on the outside, soft and chewy inside. Served with yogurt or fresh fruit.

Appetizers (Non Veg).title: Jeri (Jalebi)
Appetizers (Non Veg).shortDescription: Sweet pretzel-shaped dessert soaked in syrup.
Appetizers (Non Veg).fullDescription: Crispy swirls of fermented batter deep-fried and soaked in fragrant sugar syrup. Served warm with a sprinkle of nuts. A popular festival sweet across Nepal.

Curry.title: Masala Tea
Curry.fullDescription: Strong black tea boiled with milk and a blend of Nepali spices including cardamom, cinnamon, ginger, and cloves. A warming drink perfect for any time of day.

Curry.title: Chyang (Rice Beer)
Curry.fullDescription: An ancient Himalayan beverage made from fermented rice or millet. Mildly alcoholic with a distinctive sour flavor. Served in traditional wooden containers.
